bibl.title: èluk∞w ky in the Aphrodito Papyri = kÒllayon of Salt? <halukes kth/, kollathon>
bibl.note: Complément à: IDEM, A Note on Syriac Sabitha and Kollathon in the Papyri, ibidem, pp. 83-86. - "The contraction ky [P. Lond. IV, 1393, 1414, 1434, 1435, 1448, 1515; P. Laur. IV, 192] should not be expanded to read kÒllayon; it represents a measure of indeterminate nature." <kth, kollathon>
MAYERSON Philip, èluk∞w ky in the Aphrodito Papyri = kÒllayon of Salt? <halukes kth/, kollathon>
